title: Promi-Treffen bei "Diese Büchners" – dann folgt der Schreck
Lazio più coperta con la Juve: Lazzari infortunato, chi giocherà al suo posto
creator: Francesco Tringali
content: ROMA - Frecce spuntate in casa Lazio , Baroni deve fare i conti con i primi problemi sulle corsie. Ha perso Manuel Lazzari per almeno un mese: l'infortunio rimediato domenica contro l' Empoli è apparso subito grave, l'esito degli esami ha confermato le sensazioni pessimistiche. Un duro colpo per la Lazio, costretta così a rinunciare a un titolare protagonista di quest'esaltante avvio di stagione. La spinta dell'ex Spal a destra, abbinata agli affondi di Tavares a sinistra, si sono rivelati un fattore determinante nello sviluppo della manovra offensiva preparata in estate da Baroni , chiamato ora a trovare nuove soluzioni. La lesione muscolare di medio grado a carico del retto femorale della coscia sinistra verrà smaltita da Lazzari in quattro settimane, di cui due, quantomeno, verranno assorbite dalla sosta per le nazionali. Uno dei soliti sprint velenosi gli è costato carissimo, il ko arriva nel suo momento migliore, interrompe una titolarità indiscussa come non si vedeva dai tempi di Inzaghi . E ora Marusic scalda i motori: verrà sfruttato nel suo ruolo naturale dopo diversi anni passati spesso sulla corsia mancina, adattato proprio per non dover rinunciare a Lazzari dall'altra parte del campo. Baroni fin qui ha sfruttato il montenegrino solo nelle rotazioni del giovedì, adesso le soluzioni alternative su quella fascia sono finite. A Formello le valutazioni in queste ore sono andate su un possibile reinserimento di Hysaj , fuori dal progetto ed escluso dalla lista...

title: Un Cholito per il Toro: a gennaio si torna su Simeone, la richiesta del Napoli
creator: Camillo Forte
content: Dopo il doppio allenamento di ieri c’è stato un summit tra lo staff tecnico e quello dirigenziale per capire come comportarsi dopo il grave infortunio di Zapata . Si stanno valutando le possibili soluzioni. Anche per quanto riguarda gli esterni: e qui torna di moda Candreva che è svincolato . L’entourage del giocatore era già stato contattato un mese fa ma poi non si è fatto niente, le prime avvisaglie sono cadute nel dimenticatoio. Probabilmente Vanoli si aspettava di più dagli esterni. Adesso la situazione è cambiata. Con la possibilità di cambiare sistema di gioco, l’ex Salernitana potrebbe essere ripreso in considerazione. Il giocatore nell’ultimo anno a Salerno ha percepito un ingaggio di un milione e 850mila euro: ovvio che questa cifra (eventualmente) non gli sarà più garantita dal club granata. L’idea potrebbe essere quella di proporgli un contatto fino al termine della stagione con un ingaggio legato ai gettoni di presenza. Antonio Candreva ha 37 anni, 38 tra qualche mese (a febbraio) ma non ha avuto particolari problemi fisici e, quindi, gestito nella maniera giusta potrebbe tornare utile alla causa granata. Sino ad oggi, però, nessuno ha bussato in maniera convinta alla sua porta. La necessità maggiore, però, riguarda l’attacco. Si è fatto anche un pensiero allo svincolato Choupo-Moting , camerunense, 35 anni, ex Bayern e adesso si valuta Maxi Lopez , uruguaiano, ex Trabzonspor, pure lui svincolato svincolato, ma alla fine si è deciso di aspettare...

title: Ferrari, vent'anni di storia di Ginnastica e dell'Italia. Grazie Vanessa
creator: Roberto Bertellino
content: Le indiscrezioni che ormai da mesi si susseguivano e lasciavano intendere un ritiro dalle scene di Vanessa Ferrari , colei che ha fatto la storia della ginnastica artistica italiana negli ultimi 20 anni, hanno trovato conferma ieri. La 34enne atleta di Orzinuovi ha dato ufficialità allo stop definitivo in un’intervista a BresciaOggi: « Sto annunciando il ritiro ora. Lo avevo già deciso prima di Parigi: quella parigina sarebbe stata l’ultimo atto della mia vicenda agonistica. Desideravo fosse il finale della mia carriera. Mi spiace non sia stato così ma è arrivato il momento di dire basta e, credetemi, sono serena. Fisicamente gli infortuni si stanno facendo sentire. Sono orgogliosissima della mia carriera, di quello che sono riuscita a fare in tempi in cui in Italia era tutto molto difficile per la ginnastica e non si pensava affatto di arrivare fino a quel punto. Si capirà col tempo cosa accadrà, cosa potrò fare, servirà tempo per comprenderlo ma di certo ci sarà sempre la ginnastica nella mia vita ». La vita sportiva di Vanessa Ferrari, tanto determinata quanto fragile, è stata a dir poco ricca. Di successi eclatanti, come l’oro mondiale del 2006 ad Aarhus in Danimarca e l’argento olimpico di Tokyo nella sua quarta partecipazione ai Giochi nel corpo libero, e ancora quattro i titoli europei nella sua personale bacheca, sei Coppe del Mondo e 22 titoli italiani. Purtroppo anche di molti infortuni e ben nove interventi chirurgici. Ogni volta Vanessa ha saputo...

title: Княжевская сообщила о реконструкции производственно-складских зданий в Очаково-Матвеевском
creator: utro@utro.ru (Роман ИГНАТОВ)
content: ПредседательКомитета по архитектуре и градостроительствуМосквы (Москомархитектура), входящегов Комплекс градостроительной политикии строительства столицы, ЮлианаКняжевская сообщила о внесении изменений в правила землепользования и застройки города в отношении территориальной зоны. Мера коснется участков, расположенных на Рябиновой улице – это владение45, земельный участок 51А/10, и владение45, строение 19. "Реконструкциюпроизводственно-складских зданийпроведут на участке площадью 5,53 гектарав районе Очаково-Матвеевское на западеМосквы. Это позволит модернизироватьинфраструктуру и привести ее в соответствиес современными требованиями. Суммарнаяпоэтажная площадь объектов составит84,12 тысячи квадратных метров", – сказалаЮлианаКняжевская. Благодаря реконструкции таких объектов в столице повысится эффективность использования территории и появятся дополнительныевозможности для логистики и храненияпродукции. Ранее Княжевская о строительстве в Люблине спорткомплекса с образовательным центром.

title: L’ultima freccia di Motta: Juve-Lazio, la sorpresa per tamponare l’emergenza
creator: Paolo Pirisi
content: TORINO - La batteria di esterni a disposizione di Thiago Motta, in vista della sfida contro la Lazio di sabato prossimo, vive una fase di contrazione. Pesano, in questo senso, due assenze: una sicura, l'altra possibile. Trattasi di Francisco Conceiçao e Timothy Weah (oltre a Nico Gonzalez , che sta smaltendo la lesione del retto femorale): il primo è stato appiedato dal Giudice Sportivo dopo l'espulsione contro il Cagliari, il secondo è rimasto alla Continassa e sta facendo il possibile per recuperare rapidamente dall'infortunio alla caviglia, ma non è ancora considerato tra i disponibili per la prossima sfida di campionato. Per questo Motta potrebbe nuovamente attingere dalla Next Gen per rimpolpare le corsie. Il primo nome, quello più comodo per tamponare l'emergenza esterni, è quello di Livano Comenencia, che però rientrerà a Torino solamente la settimana prossima : con la nazionale di Curacao, infatti, giocherà in Concacaf Nations League domani sera e lunedì contro Grenada. Non è ancora certa una chiamata con la prima squadra: dipenderà anche da come rientreranno i Nazionali sparsi per il mondo, ma la candidatura di Comenencia è la più credibile per un salto provvisorio e immediato. Con la Next Gen salterà la sfida di dopodomani contro il Giugliano, ma in questi giorni spera di esprimersi al massimo in Nazionale: sa che avrà gli occhi della Juventus puntati addosso e non soltanto quelli di Paolo Montero, desideroso di portare i bianconeri rapidamente...

title: SOSOK Trinovi Khairani Sitorus Anggota DPR RI Termiskin, Profesi Sang Ayah Disorot
content: Inilah sosok termiskin. Profesi ayah Trinovi Khairani disorot. Inilah profil Trinovi Khairani Sitorus, anggota DPR RI periode 2024-2029 yang didapuk memiliki kekayaan paling miskin. Trinovi merupakan anggota DPR dari Partai Golkar. Ia jadi sorotan usai diketahui memiliki harta kekayaan paling sedikit dibanding anggota DPR RI lainnya. Lantas berapa harta kekayaannya? Berdasarkan Laporan Harta Kekayaan Pejabat Negara (LHKPN), Trinovi hanya memiliki sebidang tanah di Kota Labuhan Batu Utara senilai Rp 60 juta, 1 unit motor merek Honda CRF senilai Rp 37 juta, harta bergerak lainnya sebesar Rp 341 juta, kas dan setara kas sebesar Rp 20 juta dan utang sebesar Rp 100 juta. Dengan demikian total harta kekayaannya hanya Rp 358 juta. Dikutip Tribun-medan.com dari , Trinovi Khairani Sitorus ternyata bukanlah orang sembarangan, ia merupakan anak dari seorang mantan Bupati. Lantas seperti apa profilnya? Meski menyandang status sebagai anggota DPR RI “termiskin”, sosok Trinovi Khairani ternyata bukanlah orang sembarangan. Dia merupakan putri dari Khairuddin Syah alias Buyung Sitorus, mantan Bupati Labuhanbatu Utara (Labura) dua periode, 2010-2015 dan 2016-2021. Nama Buyung Sitorus pernah menjadi buah bibir ketika dia ditangkap dan ditahan Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) medio 2021 silam.

title: SME Minúta: Ukrajinská armáda hlási, že v ruskom Krasnodarskom kraji zasiahla sklad dronov Šahíd
content: Ukrajinská armáda tvrdí, že v stredu zasiahla sklad dronov Šahíd v ruskom Krasnodarskom kraji. Monitorovanie potvrdilo presný zásah cieľa a následnú detonáciu v sklade, uviedol ukrajinský generálny štáb. Podľa informácií ukrajinskej armády Rusi v objekte skladovali približne 400 bezpilotných lietadiel. Loading Moskva za jeden deň stratila viac ako tisíc vojakov, tvrdí ukrajinská armáda. Počet príslušníkov ruských ozbrojených síl vyradených z boja sa tak od začiatku vojny zvýšil na 665 200, uviedol ukrajinský generálny štáb. Za uplynulý deň Moskva podľa neho prišla aj o jeden tank, 14 obrnených bojových vozidiel pechoty, 41 delostreleckých systémov a dva raketomety. Od začiatku invázie na Ukrajinu Rusko podľa Kyjeva celkovo stratilo už 8 945 tankov, 17 765 obrnených bojových vozidiel pechoty, 19 263 delostreleckých systémov a 1 225 raketometov (SITA) Nemecko vyhostilo dvojicu prokremeľských aktivistov a zakázalo im návrat do Európskej únie na dvadsať rokov. Nemecké úrady zrušili prokremeľskej aktivistke Jelene Kolbasnikovovej povolenie na pobyt a zakázali jej vstup na územie Nemecka, kde opakovane organizovala zhromaždenia na podporu ruskej invázie na Ukrajinu. Rovnaké rozhodnutie nemecké úrady prijali aj v prípade jej partnera Maxa Schlunda, ktorý predtým používal meno Rostislav Tesľuk. Obaja majú zakázaný vstup na územie Nemecka a Európskej únie na nasledujúcich 20 rokov, informovala...

title: Бетербиев и Бивол показаха уменията си на открити тренировки
content: Шампионите в полутежка категория в профи бокса Дмитрий Бивол (23-0) и Артур Бетербиев (20-0) зарадваха феновете си с отворена тренировка и ги подгряха за голямата битка в събота вечер (12.10). Двамата руснаци ще премерят сили в планиран за 12 рунда сблъсък в Рияд, който ще определи безспорния хегемон в дивизията до 80 килограма. Бетербиев впечатли на ринга с упражненията си за сила и баланс със собствена тежест, които включваха и лицеви опори на пръсти, докато Бивол заложи на демонстрация на уменията си върху лапите. Битките в Саудитска Арабия започват в 21:00 часа българско време в събота (12.10). Очаква се Бивол и Бетербиев да се качат на ринга в полунощ, българско време. ще отразява двубоя в реално време. Ето и списък с всички двубои: Артур Бетербиев - Дмитрий Бивол Фабио Уордли - Фрейзър Кларк Джей Опетая - Джак Мейси Крис Юбенк - Камил Шереметя Бен Уитакър - Лиам Камерън Скай Никълсън - Рейвън Чапман Мохамед Алакел - Хесус Гонзалес Снимки: Gettyimages

Guerra, ultime notizie. Pentagono, 600mila soldati russi morti e feriti in Ucraina. Ribelli Houthi attaccano nave nel Mar Rosso
content: Mosca, ’nella notte abbattuti 92 droni ucraini’ Le difese aere russe hanno abbattuto la notte scorsa 92 droni d’attacco ucraini in varie regioni del Paese: lo ha reso noto su Telegram il ministero della Difesa russo. In particolare, si legge in un comunicato, 47 velivoli senza pilota sono stati intercettati sul territorio della regione di Krasnodar, 12 sulla regione di Kursk, nove sulla regione di Rostov, quattro sulla regione di Bryansk, due ciascuno sui territori della regione di Belgorod e della Crimea occupata, uno sulla regione di Voronezh e 15 sul Mar d’Azov. Pentagono, 600mila soldati russi morti e feriti in Ucraina Oltre 600.000 soldati russi sono stati uccisi o sono rimasti feriti in Ucraina dall’inizio dell’invasione del Paese da parte delle forze di Moca: lo hanno detto ai media funzionari del Pentagono che hanno voluto mantenere l’anonimato, come riportano i media internazionali. Questa stima, commenta Politico, è di 40 volte superiore alle perdite subite dalla Russia durante la sua decennale invasione dell’Afghanistan negli anni ’90 ed è in linea con le precedenti stime del governo Ucraino. Houthi attaccano nave nel Mar Rosso Una serie di sospetti attacchi da parte dei ribelli Houthi dello Yemen ha preso di mira una nave nel Mar Rosso. La nave è stata colpita per la prima volta giovedì da un proiettile che ha danneggiato l’imbarcazione ma non ha innescato alcun incendio e non ha causato feriti. Questo secondo il centro per le operazioni commerciali marittime...

title: Exalta To Lam papel y posición especialmente importantes de Hanoi
creator: Moisés Pérez Mok
content: La primera célula comunista se estableció en Hanoi, donde el 19 de agosto de 1945 la Revolución de Agosto obtuvo una victoria completa y días después, el 2 de septiembre, el presidente Ho Chi Minh leyó la Declaración de Independencia, dando origen a la República Democrática de Vietnam y abriendo una nueva era, rememoró Lam. En un discurso pronunciado en el acto conmemorativo por el aniversario 70 del Día de la Liberación de Hanoi, el máximo dirigente vietnamita encomió la lucha extremadamente heroica sostenida durante 60 días por los capitalinos en 1946 contra el ocupante francés, la cual abrió una guerra de resistencia a nivel nacional. Nunca olvidaremos el momento histórico de la mañana del 10 de octubre de 1954, cuando el Comité de Asuntos Militares de la ciudad y las unidades militares emprendieron una marcha histórica hacia Hanoi para ser recibidos por más de 40 mil capitalinos, que esa misma tarde presenciaron conmovidas la ceremonia de izamiento de la bandera. El líder partidista significó que “ese momento histórico es un testimonio de la fuerza nacional, el espíritu de solidaridad y el deseo de paz de nuestro pueblo, un hito que abrió un nuevo período de desarrollo para la capital y el país, marcando la derrota total de los colonialistas franceses y poniendo fin a nueve años de larga resistencia. Aludió también a los 12 días y noches de diciembre de 1972 cuando se libró la llamada batalla de “Dien Bien Phu en el aire” en la que el...

title: Viral: ಶಿಕ್ಷಕಿಯ ಸ್ಟೈಲಿಶ್‌ ರ‍್ಯಾಂಪ್ ವಾಕ್‌ಗೆ ಕ್ಲೀನ್‌ ಬೋಲ್ಡ್‌ ಆದ ವಿದ್ಯಾರ್ಥಿಗಳು; ಸಖತ್‌ ವೈರಲ್‌ ಆಯ್ತು ವಿಡಿಯೋ
creator: TV9 Web Team
content: ಶಾಲಾ-ಕಾಲೇಜುಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಯಾವುದಾದರೂ ಕಾರ್ಯಕ್ರಮದಲ್ಲಿ ಶಿಕ್ಷಕರು ಡಾನ್ಸ್‌ ಮಾಡಿದ್ರೆ ಅಥವಾ ಸ್ಪೋರ್ಟ್ಸ್‌ ಡೇ ದಿನ ಸಖತ್‌ ಆಗಿ ಆಟವಾಡಿದ್ರೆ ಶಿಕ್ಷಕರ ಈ ಟ್ಯಾಲೆಂಟ್‌ ಕಂಡು ವಿದ್ಯಾರ್ಥಿಗಳು ಹುಚ್ಚೆದ್ದು ಕುಣಿಯುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಇಂತಹ ಸಾಕಷ್ಟು ಸಿಹಿ ಘಟನೆಗಳು ಶಾಲಾ-ಕಾಲೇಜುಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆಯುತ್ತಲೇ ಇರುತ್ತವೆ. ಇದೀಗ ಅಂತಹದ್ದೇ ವಿಡಿಯೋವೊಂದು ವೈರಲ್‌ ಆಗಿದ್ದು, ಶಿಕ್ಷಕಿಯೊಬ್ಬರು ಕಾಲೇಜಿನಲ್ಲಿ ನಡೆದ ಕಾರ್ಯಕ್ರಮವೊಂದರಲ್ಲಿ ಸ್ಟೇಜ್‌ ಮೇಲೆ ಸ್ಟೈಲಿಶ್‌ ಆಗಿ ರ‍್ಯಾಂಪ್ ವಾಕ್‌ ಮಾಡಿದ್ದು, ಇವರ ಈ ರ‍್ಯಾಂಪ್ ವಾಂಕ್‌ಗೆ ಅಲ್ಲಿದ್ದ ವಿದ್ಯಾರ್ಥಿಗಳು ಕ್ಲೀನ್‌ ಬೋಲ್ಡ್‌ ಆಗಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಮುಂಬೈನ ನರ್ಸೀ ಮೋಂಜಿ ಇನ್‌ಸ್ಟಿಟ್ಯೂಟ್‌ ಆಫ್‌ ಮ್ಯಾನೇಜ್‌ಮೆಂಟ್‌ ಸ್ಟಡೀಸ್‌ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಶಿಕ್ಷಕರ ದಿನಾಚರಣೆಯ ಅಂಗವಾಗಿ ನಡೆದ ಕಾರ್ಯಕ್ರಮವೊಂದರಲ್ಲಿ ಅಲ್ಲಿನ ಮಹಿಳಾ ಶಿಕ್ಷಕಿಯೊಬ್ಬರು ಸ್ಟೈಲಿಶ್‌ ಆಗಿ ರ‍್ಯಾಂಪ್ ವಾಕ್‌ ಮಾಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಕಪ್ಪು ಬಣ್ಣದ ಮಿನುಗುವ ಟಾಪ್‌ ಮತ್ತು ಬೆಲ್-ಬಾಟಮ್‌ ಪ್ಯಾಂಟ್‌ ಧರಿಸಿ ಶಿಕ್ಷಕಿ ಆತ್ಮ ವಿಶ್ವಾಸದಿಂದ ಸ್ಟೈಲಿಶ್‌ ಆಗಿ ರ‍್ಯಾಂಪ್ ಮೇಲೆ ಹೆಜ್ಜೆ ಹಾಕಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಇವರ ಈ ಬೋಲ್ಡ್‌ ವಾಕ್‌ಗೆ ವಿದ್ಯಾರ್ಥಿಗಳು ಕ್ಲೀನ್‌ ಬೋಲ್ಡ್‌ ಆಗಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಕಾವ್ಯ ಚೌಧರಿ (kavya)_chaudhary_30) ಎಂಬವರು ತಮ್ಮ ಇನ್‌ಸ್ಟಾಗ್ರಾಮ್‌ ಖಾತೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹಂಚಿಕೊಂಡಿರುವ ವಿಡಿಯೋದಲ್ಲಿ ಶಿಕ್ಷಕಿಯೊಬ್ಬರು ಸ್ಟೇಜ್‌ ಮೇಲೆ ಸಖತ್‌ ಆಗಿ ರ‍್ಯಾಂಪ್ ವಾಕ್‌ ಮಾಡುತ್ತಾ ಬರುವ ದೃಶ್ಯವನ್ನು ಕಾಣಬಹುದು. ಶಿಕ್ಷಕಿಯ ಬೋಲ್ಡ್‌ ರ‍್ಯಾಂಪ್ ವಾಕ್‌ಗೆ ಸ್ಟೇಜ್‌ ಮೇಲಿದ್ದ ವಿದ್ಯಾರ್ಥಿಗಳು ಹುಚ್ಚೆದ್ದು ಕುಣಿದಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಸೆಪ್ಟೆಂಬರ್‌ 05 ರಂದು ಹಂಚಿಕೊಳ್ಳಲಾದ ಈ ವಿಡಿಯೋ 20.6 ಮಿಲಿಯನ್‌ ವೀಕ್ಷಣೆಗಳನ್ನು ಹಾಗೂ ಹಲವಾರು ಕಾಮೆಂಟ್ಸ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಪಡೆದುಕೊಂಡಿದೆ. ಒಬ್ಬ ಬಳಕೆದಾರರು ʼಮಾಡೆಲ್‌ ಆಗಬೇಕಿದ್ದ ಇವರು ತಪ್ಪಿ ಶಿಕ್ಷಕಿಯಾಗಿದ್ದಾರೆʼ ಎಂಬ ಕಾಮೆಂಟ್‌ ಬರೆದುಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಮತ್ತೊಬ್ಬ ಬಳಕೆದಾರರು ʼಈ ವಿಡಿಯೋ ತುಂಬಾನೇ ಮುದ್ದಾಗಿದೆʼ ಎಂದು ಹೇಳಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ವೈರಲ್ ಸುದ್ದಿಗಳಿಗಾಗಿ ಇಲ್ಲಿ

title: Lebanese Health Minister thanks Qatar for generous stance, urgent assistance
content: Beirut: The State of Qatar has always demonstrated unwavering support for Lebanon amid the crises it is battling, caretaker Minister of Public Health H E Firas Abiad said on Tuesday. Qatar’s urgent response via a relief air bridge with medical, food and shelter supplies reflects the deep and fraternal relation between the two countries, he told a press conference. Extending sincere thanks and gratitude to the State of Qatar and Amir H H Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani for the generous stance and urgent assistance amid this difficult time, Abiad added assistance was the first in an aircraft string due to arrive gradually, contributing to mitigating the country’s medical and food shortages. The aid also conveys a message that the Lebanese people would not be left alone and represents a symbol of Arab solidarity and cooperation, he added. The support will help health professionals to provide medical services to alleviate the suffering of the Lebanese people, with the number of injured approaching 10,000, and the displaced people exceeding 1,200,000, more than 25 percent of the country’s population, he added. Stressing the need for a ceasefire and diplomatic solutions to stop the Israeli aggression, Abiad emphasised that the Arab efforts, primarily those of the State of Qatar, could help reach a solution that saves the country and restores security and stability. Meanwhile, the caretaker Minister of Environment H E Nasser Yassin stressed that the Qatari aid came at the right...

title: EN IMAGES. Ouragan Milton : villes sous les eaux, toit de stade arraché... découvrez les premiers dégâts de la tempête qui frappe la Floride
content: Les images font froid dans le dos . L’ouragan Milton a touché terre en Floride aux États-Unis dans la nuit de mercredi à jeudi et les premiers dégâts sont impressionnants. Tampa, l’une des principales villes de l’État, est particulièrement touchée. Milton est arrivé sur la côte ouest de la Floride "près de Siesta Key dans le comté de Sarasota", a écrit le Centre américain des ouragans (NHC) dans son bulletin de 20H30 (00H30 GMT). Des vents atteignant 165 km/h ont été enregistrés dans la soirée, a relevé cette source, mettant en garde contre des risques de submersion. Milton devrait traverser la Floride d’ouest en est, selon le NHC, passant notamment près de la ville d’Orlando, où les parcs d’attraction de Disney World ont été fermés à la mi-journée. Les aéroports de Tampa et Sarasota sont à l’arrêt. Des tornades ont par ailleurs été observées dans le centre et le sud de l’Etat, selon la chaîne Weather Channel. Plus petite, la ville de Fort Myers est aussi innondée. À Saint-Petersbourg l’inquiétude est grande alors que la ville subit des pluies et des vents particulièrement violents. Le toit du Tropicana Field Stadium de St. Petersburg, en Floride, a été détruit par l’ouragan Milton mercredi. De nombreux messages sur les réseaux sociaux ont montré le toit en lambeaux. Le stade accueille l’équipe de baseball des Tampa Bay Rays. La tempête devrait continuer de faire de sérieux dégats dans le Sud-Est des États-Unis.

title: সবজির দর ছাড়িয়েছে শতকের ঘর

title: George Baldock: Sheffield United-Spieler aus England stirbt mit 31 Jahren
creator: Christoph Cöln
content: George Baldock war über viele Jahre Stammspieler bei Sheffield United. Nun wurde der englische Fußballer in einer Wohnanlage in Griechenland tot aufgefunden. Der englische Fußballspieler George Baldock ist tot. Der ehemalige Spieler des englischen Zeitligisten Sheffield United wurde laut britischen Medien am Mittwoch tot im Schwimmbad seines Hauses in Athen gefunden. Über die Todesursache ist bislang nichts bekannt. Der Abwehrspezialist spielte sieben Jahre lang bei Sheffield United, stieg mit dem Zweitligisten im Jahr 2022/23 in die Premier League auf und verließ den Verein nach dem Abstieg in der vergangenen Saison, um beim griechischen Traditionsklub Panathinaikos Athen anzuheuern. Sheffield United kondolierte angesichts der erschütternden Nachricht umgehend. "Der Club ist schockiert und sehr traurig über den Tod des ehemaligen Spielers George Baldock", hieß es in einer Mitteilung bei X. "[Er] war bei Fans, Mitarbeitern und Mitspielern, die mit ihm das rot-weiße Trikot trugen, äußerst beliebt. Unser aufrichtiges Beileid gilt allen, die mit Sheffield United verbunden sind, vor allem aber Georges Familie und Freunden." Rettungskräfte konnten nur noch den Tod feststellen Wie die Zeitung "Daily Mail" berichtet, soll Baldocks Frau die griechischen Behörden informiert haben, nachdem ihr Mann sich nicht bei ihr gemeldet hatte. Als die Beamten daraufhin in die Villa des Fußballers in Glyfada, einem luxuriösen Vorort von Athen, eindrangen, fanden sie den Sportler offenbar...

title: Honda 0 serisinin yeni teknolojileri Japonya'da tanıtıldı
content: Honda, Japonya’da düzenlenen "Honda 0 Teknoloji Toplantısı"nda yeni teknolojilerini ve 0 serisine yönelik yaklaşımını tanıttı. Toplantıda, Honda’nın elektrikli araçlara yönelik küresel vizyonu ve karbon nötr hedefleri ön planda yer aldı. 7 MODEL YOLDA Şirket, 2030 yılına kadar küçük, orta ve büyük boyutlu olmak üzere toplam yedi adet Honda 0 serisi modelini piyasaya sürmeyi hedeflediğini açıkladı. Bu vizyonun ilk adımı, CES 2024 etkinliğinde tanıtılan "Saloon" ve "Space-Hub" isimli iki konsept modelle atıldı. Serinin ilk seri üretim modelinin 2026'da satışa sunulması planlanıyor ve bu modelin, serinin amiral gemisi olacağı belirtiliyor. Honda 0 serisi, "İnce, Hafif ve Bilge" prensipleri temel alınarak geliştiriliyor. Araçlar, sanatsal tasarım, gelişmiş sürüş destek sistemleri, Nesnelerin İnterneti (IoT) entegrasyonu gibi beş temel değeri ön planda tutuyor. Honda, ince tasarım prensibiyle araçları hem estetik hem de konforlu hale getirmeyi, hafif yapısıyla ise daha dinamik bir sürüş deneyimi sunmayı hedefliyor. Bu hedefler doğrultusunda, ultra yüksek dayanımlı çelik kullanılarak yeni bir elektrikli araç platformu geliştirildi. Ayrıca, kompakt e-Aks ve ince batarya paketi ile birleşen bu yapı, araç içi alanın daha verimli kullanılmasına olanak tanıyor ve denge ile dinamik sürüş sağlıyor. Honda'nın geliştirdiği aktif aerodinamik sistem de araç hızına göre hava direncini optimize ederek enerji verimliliğini artırıyor....

title: Αρκάς: Η «Καλημέρα» του για τον τυφώνα Μίλτον
content: Ακρως επίκαιρη και καυστική «καλημέρα» από τον Αρκά με αφορμή τον τυφώνα Μίλτον που πλήττει τη Φλόριντα Καυστικός Αρκάς σήμερα 10 Οκτωβρίου 2024 που ο τυφώνας Μίλτον σαρώνει στη Φλόριντα . Ο σκιτσογράφος με αφορμή τη σημερινή ημέρα και την κατάσταση που επικρατεί στη Φλόριντα εξαιτίας του τυφώνα Μίλτον σκιτσάρει μια όχι και τόσο χιουμοριστική «Καλημέρα». Αντίθετα κάνει σαφή αναφορά στον σεβασμό που δεν επιδεικνύουμε στη φύση και το περιβάλλον με αποτέλεσμα τα ακραία καιρικά φαινόμενα, όπως ο τυφώνας Μίλτον και οι επιπτώσεις του . Στο σκίτσο του εντάσσει και μια φράση που αποδίδει στον Φράνσις Μπέικον : «Η φύση δε δαμάζεται αν δεν τη σεβαστείς» Ακολουθεί το σκίτο του Αρκά

title: Ob svetovnem dnevu o duševnem zdravju na delovnem mestu
content: Izbor tematike kaže na globalno zavedanje o pomenu in aktualnosti področja duševnega zdravja pri delu, so poudarili na Nacionalnem inštitutu za javno zdravje (NIJZ). Delo v neurejenih delovnih pogojih lahko namreč poslabša duševno in telesno zdravje zaposlenih. Slabo duševno zdravje zaposlenih za delovne organizacije pomeni nižjo produktivnost ter višje stroške zaradi bolniških odsotnosti in fluktuacije. Vse to pa posledično pomeni tudi višje finančne in socialne stroške za celotno družbo, so opozorili na Nacionalnem inštitutu za javno zdravje (NIJZ). Eden najpomembnejših dejavnikov duševnega zdravja v delovnih okoljih so psihosocialna tveganja, ki v zadnjem času veljajo za največji izziv varnosti in zdravja pri delu. Delo v slabih psihosocialnih pogojih povezujejo tudi z duševnimi motnjami, na primer z depresivnimi in anksioznimi motnjami. Med najpomembnejša psihosocialna tveganja na delovnem mestu uvrščajo prekomerno obremenitev pri delu, prenizko stopnjo avtonomije, slabe odnose in slabo obveščanje o organizacijskih spremembah. Skrb za dobro duševno počutje na delovnem mestu je zaveza in odgovornost tako delodajalcev kot tudi zaposlenih, so poudarili na inštitutu. Vendar pa imajo ključno vlogo pri zagotavljanju urejenih in zdravih psihosocialnih delovnih pogojev vodstveni in vodilni delavci. Zato je ključno, da zagotovijo pogoje za odkrivanje, prepoznavanje in obvladovanje psihosocialnih tveganj v skladu z zakonom o varnosti in zdravju pri...

title: A hollandok ellen a védekezésen lehet a hangsúly
content: Kőkemény négy mérkőzés vár még a válogatottra a 2024-es esztendőben. Pénteken a Puskás Arénában 20.45-től Hollandia, hétfőn idegenben, Zenicán – szintén 20.45-ös kezdéssel – Bosznia-Hercegovina vár a Marco Rossi által vezetett nemzeti csapatra, hogy aztán november 16-án Amszterdamban ismét a hollandok ellen próbáljon jó eredményt elérni, majd az év lezárásaként november 19-én Németországot fogadja Budapesten. Mindennek ígérkezik ez a négyszer kilencven perc, csak sétagaloppnak nem, különösen úgy, hogy volt már jobb passzban is a csapat. A szeptemberi, düsseldorfi 5–0-s kiütés alaposan megroppantotta a játékosok addigi stabil önbizalmát, a szurkolók és maga a szövetségi kapitány, Marco Rossi is a lélektelen futballt kifogásolta leginkább, mondván, vereség és vereség között óriási a különbség. Az ötgólos zakó után volt mit megbeszélni az edzőtáborban, jellemző, hogy a játékosok is tartottak kupaktanácsot, s a keret négy-öt vezéregyénisége mond(hat)ta el a véleményét. A bosnyákok elleni 0–0 már játékban jobban nézett ki, de az együttes mindössze helyzetekig és Szoboszlai Dominik kapufájáig jutott, gólig nem... Igyekeztünk három pontban elemezni, vagy inkább összefoglalni, miben kell javulni – védekezésben, a középpályán, illetve támadásban – a pénteki, Hollandia elleni, majd az A-ligában maradást döntően befolyásoló boszniai Nemzetek Ligája-találkozóig a...

title: ಇಸ್ರೇಲ್ ಭದ್ರತೆಗೆ ಅಮೆರಿಕದ ಬದ್ಧತೆಯನ್ನು ಪುರುಚ್ಛರಿಸಿದ ಬೈಡನ್
creator: ಪ್ರಜಾವಾಣಿ ವೆಬ್‌ ಡೆಸ್ಕ್‌
content: ವಾಷಿಂಗ್ಟನ್ : ಇಸ್ರೇಲ್ ಪ್ರಧಾನಿ ಬೆಂಜಮಿನ್ ನೇತನ್ಯಾಹು ಜೊತೆಗೆ ದೂರವಾಣಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಮಾತನಾಡಿದ ಅಮೆರಿಕದ ಅಧ್ಯಕ್ಷ ಜೋ ಬೈಡನ್, ಇಸ್ರೇನ್ ಭಧ್ರತೆಗೆ ಅಮೆರಿಕದ ಅಚಲ ಬದ್ಧತೆಯನ್ನು ಪುನರುಚ್ಛರಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಶ್ವೇತಭವನದ ಹೇಳಿಕೆಯ ಪ್ರಕಾರ, ಸಾವಿರಾರು ಕ್ಷಿಪಣಿಗಳು ಮತ್ತು ರಾಕೆಟ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಹಾರಿಸಿದ ಹಿಜ್ಬುಲ್ಲಾದಿಂದ ನಾಗರಿಕರನ್ನು ರಕ್ಷಿಸುವ ಇಸ್ರೇಲ್‌ನ ಹಕ್ಕನ್ನು ಬೈಡನ್ ಪ್ರತಿಪಾದಿಸಿದರು. ಅಲ್ಲದೆ, ದಟ್ಟ ಜನಸಂಖ್ಯೆ ಇರುವ ಬೈರೂತ್‌ನಂತಹ ಪ್ರದೇಶಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ನಾಗರಿಕರಿಗೆ ಹಾನಿ ಕಡಿಮೆ ಮಾಡುವ ಅಗತ್ಯವನ್ನು ಒತ್ತಿಹೇಳಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಉಪಾಧ್ಯಕ್ಷೆ ಕಮಲಾ ಹ್ಯಾರಿಸ್ ಸಹ ಇಸ್ರೇಲಿ ಪ್ರಧಾನಿಯೊಂದಿಗಿನ ಕರೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಮಾತನಾಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಅಕ್ಟೋಬರ್ 1ರಂದು ಇಸ್ರೇಲ್ ಮೇಲೆ ಇರಾನ್‌ನ ಖಂಡಾಂತರ ಕ್ಷಿಪಣಿ ದಾಳಿಯನ್ನು ಬೈಡನ್ ಖಂಡಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಅಂತಹ ಆಕ್ರಮಣದ ವಿರುದ್ಧ ಸಾಮೂಹಿಕ ಕ್ರಮದ ಅಗತ್ಯವನ್ನು ಒತ್ತಿಹೇಳಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಎರಡೂ ದೇಶಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ನಾಗರಿಕರು ಸುರಕ್ಷಿತವಾಗಿ ತಮ್ಮ ಮನೆಗಳಿಗೆ ಹಿಂದಿರುಗಲು ‘ಬ್ಲೂ ಲೈನ್’ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯ ಕುರಿತಂತೆ ರಾಜತಾಂತ್ರಿಕ ವ್ಯವಸ್ಥೆಯನ್ನು ಪ್ರತಿಪಾದಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಗಾಜಾ ಜೊತೆಗಿನ ರಾಜತಾಂತ್ರಿಕತೆ ನವೀಕರಿಸುವ ಮತ್ತು ಹಮಾಸ್ ಒತ್ತೆಯಾಳಾಗಿರಿಸಿಕೊಂಡಿರುವವರ ಶೀಘ್ರ ಬಿಡುಗಡೆ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ನಾಯಕರು ಮಾತುಕತೆ ನಡೆಸಿದರು. ಗಾಜಾದಲ್ಲಿನ ಮಾನವೀಯ ಪರಿಸ್ಥಿತಿ ಮತ್ತು ಜೋರ್ಡಾನ್‌ನಿಂದ ತಕ್ಷಣವೇ ಕಾರಿಡಾರ್ ಅನ್ನು ಪುನಶ್ಚೇತನಗೊಳಿಸುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಉತ್ತರಕ್ಕೆ ಪ್ರವೇಶ ಮರುಸ್ಥಾಪಿಸುವ ಅಗತ್ಯವನ್ನು ಬೈಡನ್ ಚರ್ಚಿಸಿದರು. ಅಲ್ಲದೆ, ಇಸ್ರೇಲ್ ಜೊತೆ ನಿಕಟ ಸಂಪರ್ಕದಲ್ಲಿರಲು ಒಪ್ಪಿಕೊಂಡರು ಎಂದು ಪ್ರಕಟಣೆ ತಿಳಿಸಿದೆ. ಅಕ್ಟೋಬರ್ 1ರಂದು ಇರಾನ್ ಕನಿಷ್ಠ 200 ಖಂಡಾಂತರ ಕ್ಷಿಪಣಿಗಳನ್ನು ಇಸ್ರೇಲ್‌ನತ್ತ ಉಡಾಯಿಸಿದೆ. ಇದು ಸದ್ಯ ನಡೆಯುತ್ತಿರುವ ಇರಾನ್-ಇಸ್ರೇಲ್ ಸಂಘರ್ಷದಲ್ಲಿ ಅತಿದೊಡ್ಡ ದಾಳಿಯಾಗಿದೆ. ಬುಧವಾರ, ಇಸ್ರೇಲ್ ರಕ್ಷಣಾ ಪಡೆಗಳು (ಐಡಿಎಫ್) ಬೈರೂತ್‌ನ ದಹೀಹ್ ಜಿಲ್ಲೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಎರಡು ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಹಿಜ್ಬುಲ್ಲಾ ನೆಲೆಗಳನ್ನು ಧ್ವಂಸಗೊಳಿಸಿದ್ದವು. ನಿಖರ ದಾಳಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಭಯೋತ್ಪಾದಕರ ಗುಪ್ತಚರ ಕೇಂದ್ರ ಕಚೇರಿ ಮತ್ತು...

title: Riley Garcia to repay Western Bulldog’s faith after signing three-year contract extension
creator: Aaron Kirby
content: West Australian Riley Garcia says he wants to repay the Western Bulldog’s faith after turning his back on his home state to sign a new deal at the kennel. The Swan Districts product locked in a three-year extension off the back of a career-best season despite runners-up Sydney and West Coast expressing interest in the 23-year-old’s services. The new contract locks Garcia into the Dogs, where he has played 31 games, until the end of 2027. “No doubt that moving away from home has its challenges, but it is a testament to the Club being very family-orientated,” Garcia said. “The relationships that I have here are ones I’ll have for a very long time; I love what I’ve built here. “I’m very grateful to the coaches at the Club, I feel like they are the right people to get the best out of me. “This is a Club that drafted me when I was injured at 18, I feel like I have a lot to repay to the Bulldogs – I feel like success is really close.” Garcia played a career-high 12 games in 2024, and there were whispers West Coast were interested in the Swan Districts product as they attempt to inject young talent into their rebuilding list. Mitchell Woodcock The Swans were also believed to have sounded out the youngster after their second grand final defeat in three seasons, but Garcia confirmed he would stay at the club that drafted him with pick 62 in 2019. The Dogs originally offered the midfielder a two-year deal but sweetened the contract with an extra season for security. Western Bulldogs...

title: ਭਾਰਤ ਦੇ 100 ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਅਮੀਰ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰੀਆਂ ਨੇ 1 ਟ੍ਰਿਲੀਅਨ ਦਾ ਮੀਲ ਪੱਥਰ ਪਾਰ ਕੀਤਾ, ਗੌਤਮ ਅਡਾਨੀ ਦੂਜੇ ਸਥਾਨ ’ਤੇ: ਫੋਰਬਸ
creator: Puneet Sharma
content: ਨਵੀਂ ਦਿੱਲੀ, 10 ਅਕਤੂਬਰ (ਏਜੰਸੀ) : Forbes Report: ਭਾਰਤ ਦੇ 100 ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਅਮੀਰ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰੀਆਂ ਦੀ ਸੰਪੱਤੀ ਪਹਿਲੀ ਵਾਰ ਖਰਬ ਡਾਲਰ ਦੇ ਮੀਲ ਪੱਥਰ ਨੂੰ ਪਾਰ ਕਰ ਗਈ ਹੈ। ਫੋਰਬਸ(Forbes) ਦੀ ਇੱਕ ਰਿਪੋਰਟ ਵਿੱਚ ਵੀਰਵਾਰ ਨੂੰ ਦਿਖਾਇਆ ਗਿਆ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਦੇਸ਼ ਦੇ 80 ਪ੍ਰਤੀਸ਼ਤ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਅਮੀਰ ਕਾਰੋਬਾਰੀ ਹੁਣ ਇੱਕ ਸਾਲ ਪਹਿਲਾਂ ਨਾਲੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਅਮੀਰ ਹਨ। (Forbes India) ਫੋਰਬਸ ਦੀ ਭਾਰਤ ਦੇ ਚੋਟੀ ਦੇ 100 ਅਰਬਪਤੀਆਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦੇ ਅਨੁਸਾਰ ਭਾਰਤ ਦੇ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਅਮੀਰ ਹੁਣ 1.1 ਟ੍ਰਿਲੀਅਨ ਡਾਲਰ ਦੇ ਹਨ, ਜੋ ਕਿ 2019 ਦੇ ਮੁਕਾਬਲੇ ਦੁੱਗਣੇ ਤੋਂ ਵੀ ਵੱਧ ਅਮੀਰ ਹਨ। ਰਿਪੋਰਟ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿਹਾ ਗਿਆ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਡਾਲਰ ਲਾਭਕਾਰੀ ਬੁਨਿਆਦੀ ਢਾਂਚੇ ਦੇ ਮਾਲਕ ਗੌਤਮ ਅਡਾਨੀ ਹਨ, ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਨੇ ਪਿਛਲੇ ਸਾਲ ਦੇ ਘੱਟ-ਵਿਕਰੀ ਹਮਲੇ ਤੋਂ ਮਜ਼ਬੂਤ ​​ਰਿਕਵਰੀ ਪੋਸਟ ਕੀਤੀ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਹਾਲ ਹੀ ਵਿੱਚ ਆਪਣੇ ਪੁੱਤਰਾਂ ਅਤੇ ਭਤੀਜਿਆਂ ਨੂੰ ਮੁੱਖ ਅਹੁਦਿਆਂ ‘ਤੇ ਰੱਖਿਆ ਹੈ। ਗੋਤਮ ਅਡਾਨੀ ਨੇ ਆਪਣੇ ਭਰਾ ਵਿਨੋਦ ਦੇ ਨਾਲ ਉਸਨੇ ਪਰਿਵਾਰ ਦੀ ਕੁੱਲ ਜਾਇਦਾਦ ਨੂੰ $116 ਬਿਲੀਅਨ ਤੱਕ ਲੈ ਜਾਣ ਲਈ $48 ਬਿਲੀਅਨ ਜੋੜਿਆ, ਜੋ ਨੰਬਰ 2 ਦੀ ਸਥਿਤੀ ਨੂੰ ਬਰਕਰਾਰ ਰੱਖਣ ਲਈ ਕਾਫ਼ੀ ਹੈ। ਰਿਪੋਰਟ ਦੇ ਅਨੁਸਾਰ ਭਾਰਤ ਦੇ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਅਮੀਰਾਂ ਨੇ ਪਿਛਲੇ 12 ਮਹੀਨਿਆਂ ਵਿੱਚ $316 ਬਿਲੀਅਨ ਜਾਂ ਲਗਭਗ 40 ਪ੍ਰਤੀਸ਼ਤ ਦਾ ਵਾਧਾ ਕੀਤਾ ਹੈ, ਕਿਉਂਕਿ ਪ੍ਰਧਾਨ ਮੰਤਰੀ ਨਰਿੰਦਰ ਮੋਦੀ ਦੇ ਤੀਜੇ ਕਾਰਜਕਾਲ ਵਿੱਚ ਦੇਸ਼ ਦੀ ਵਿਕਾਸ ਕਹਾਣੀ ਬਾਰੇ ਨਿਵੇਸ਼ਕਾਂ ਦਾ ਉਤਸ਼ਾਹ ਮਜ਼ਬੂਤ ​​ਬਣਿਆ ਹੋਇਆ ਹੈ। ਸਟੀਲ-ਟੂ-ਪਾਵਰ ਸਮੂਹ ਓਪੀ ਜਿੰਦਲ ਗਰੁੱਪ ਦੀ ਮਾਤਾ ਸਾਵਿਤਰੀ ਜਿੰਦਲ ਪਹਿਲੀ ਵਾਰ ਨੰਬਰ 3 ਤੱਕ ਪਹੁੰਚ ਗਈ ਹੈ। ਉਹ ਸੂਚੀ ਵਿੱਚ ਸ਼ਾਮਲ ਨੌਂ ਔਰਤਾਂ ਵਿੱਚੋਂ ਇੱਕ ਹੈ। ਆਈਏਐੱਨਐੱਸ Forbes Report India’s 100 richest tycoons

title: مفاجأة.. روما يفكر في إعادة دي روسي
content: خبرني - كشفت وسائل إعلام إيطالية عن مفاجأة مدوية قد يفجرها نادي روما في الأيام المقبلة. ذكرت صحيفة لا ريبوبليكا أن "الغيلاروسي" يفكر في إقالة مدربه الجديد المدرب الكرواتي إيفان يوريتش من منصبه. وأوضحت: "المفاجأة هي أن إدارة نادي روما تفكر في إعادة المدرب السابق دانييلي دي روسي". وقالت: "قاد يوريتش روما حتى الآن في 5 مباريات، فاز في 2 وتعادل في مثلهما وخسر واحدة، وسجل روما 7 أهداف واستقبل 4 أهداف". وأكدت على أنه على أن هناك شكوك حول استمرارية يوريتش حاليًا، بعد بضعة أسابيع فقط من تدريب الفريق، بسبب طريقة اللعب والنتائج غير المقنعة. في المقابل كان "الذئاب" قد قرر إقالة المدرب دانييلي دي روسي في سبتمبر (آيلول) الماضي من منصبه بسبب سوء النتائج.

title: [2024 국감]금융사고 7년간 6617억원...60%는 '은행'
content: 최근 국내 전체 금융업권에서 발생하고 있는 횡령·배임 등의 금융사고 규모가 매년 1000억원대 수준인 것으로 나타났다. 10건 중 약 6건은 은행에서 발생했다. 10일 국회 정무위원회 소속 강민국 국민의힘 의원이 금융감독원으로부터 받은 '국내 금융권 금융사고 발생 현황' 자료에 따르면 2018년부터 올해 8월까지 발생한 금융사고는 총 463건이다. 규모는 6616억7300만원에 달했다. 연도별로 보면 2018년 936억원(89건), 2019년 424억3900만원(60건), 2020년 281억5300만원(74건), 2021년 728억3200만원(60건), 2022년 1488억1500만원(60건), 2023년 1422억1600만원(62건) 등이다. 올해의 경우 지난 8월까지 발생한 금융사고 금액만 1336억5200만원(58건)이다. 연평균 1000억원대에 육박하는 수준이다. 금융사고 종류별로 업무상 배임이 2171억8900만원(56건)으로 가장 많았다. 뒤이어 사기 2022억7000만원(152건), 횡령·유용 1962억600만원(216건), 도난·피탈 8억4400만원(14건) 등의 순이었다. 업권별로는 은행 금융사고가 4097억500만원(264건)으로 가장 컸다. 금액으로는 전체 62%, 건수별로는 57%를 차지했다. 다음으로 증권 1113억3300만원(47건), 저축은행 647억6300만원(47건), 손해보험 458억1500만원(49건), 카드 229억6500만원(16건), 생명보험 70억9200만원(40건) 등의 순이었다. 은행 중에는 우리은행이 1421억1300만원(34.7%, 30건)으로 금융사고 규모가 압도적으로 컸다. 그다음으로 국민은행(683억2000만원, 36건),...

title: Baru, Diorama Bawah Laut Majapahit's Warrior Underwater Tambah Destinasi di Bangsring Banyuwangi
content: - Destinasi wisata di Kecamatan , Kabupaten kini memiliki ikon baru bernama 's dan monumen Mas Bagus Wangsakarya. Majapahit's berupa patung Gajahmada dan belasan prajurit berserta gapuranya yang dipasang di bawah laut dengan kedalaman sekitar 2,5 meter. Para wisatawan bisa menikmati pemandangan patung-patung tersebut saat diving atau snorkling di perairan pantai di selat Bali itu. "Ini adalah ikon spot tourism yang baru yang memang masih belum banyak ada di ," kata Adhy Karyono, saat peluncuran, Kamis (10/10/2024). Turut hadir juga dalam peresmian tersebut Konjen Jepang di Surabaya Takeyama Kenichi, Plt Bupati Sugirah, dan jajaran pejabat Pemprov Jatim dan Pemkab . Majapahit's dan monumen Mas Bagus Wangsakarya diresmikan dalam rangkaian Hari Jadi Jatim Ke-79. Adhy menjelaskan, patung-patung yang ditenggelamkan bukan sekadar fasilitas penunjang wisata, tapi sekaligus memiliki nilai edukasi sejarah. Itulah sebabnya tema kerajaan diangkat sebagai diorama bawah laut. "Bahwa dikenal sebagai Bumi , maka kami harus mewujudkan sesuatu yang yang betul-betul riil dengan adany diorama patung yang bisa menggambarkan kejayaan sebagai penguasa Nusantara pada zamannya," tuturnya. Penambahan fasilitas wisata itu, kata Adhy, untuk mendorong konjungan wisata ke Jatim, khususnya ke . Apalagi, di provinsi ini tengah bergeliat. "Perlu diketahui jumlah kunjungan wisatawan Jatik meningkat dari tahun 2023 sampai September 2024 itu meningkat sebesar 77,33 persen. Dan sektor ini bisa membawa kekuatan...

title: أزمة في الدوري الألماني بسبب دعم المثلية
content: خبرني - يشهد الدوري الألماني أزمة جديدة حاليا بسبب رفض أحد اللاعبين دعم المثلية الجنسية، واصفا إياها بـ "القرف المثلي". وكشفت صحيفة "تيليغراف" عن أن نادي فولفسبورغ الألماني قرر معاقبة مهاجمه كيفين بيرنس بسبب رفضه التوقيع على قميص تذكاري للنادي يحمل شعار قوس قزح قائلا: "لن أوقع على مثل هذا النوع من القرف المثلي". بدوره علق المدير الرياضي لنادي فولفسبورغ سيباستيان شيندزيلورز لشبكة "سكاي ألمانيا" على تصرف اللاعب: "كيفين أصبح الآن وحيدا في المنزل" في إشارة لتوقيع عقوبة على اللاعب الذي ينتهي عقده بالفعل في نهاية الموسم الجاري، وسط غموض حول تجديد التعاقد معه. واضطر اللاعب في النهاية للتراجع عن موقفه والاعتذار من الجماهير تحت وطأة الحملة الكبيرة من الانتقادات والهجوم الذي تعرض له عقب تعليقه:"تعليقاتي العفوية لم تكن مقبولة على الإطلاق"، بعدما خضع بالفعل لجلسة تحقيق في ناديه. ولا يوجد أي جديد بشأن المهاجم بيرنس، حيث ظل على مقاعد البدلاء في فوز فريقه على بوخوم 3-1، كما أن عقده سينتهي بنهاية الموسم الحالي. وعلق نادي فولفسبورغ الذي بدأ في استخدام قمصان تحمل رسومات قوس قزح من 5 أعوام، لإظهار دعمه للمثلية الجنسية: "خلال اجتماع داخلي صدرت تصريحات لا تتوافق مع موقف فولفسبورغ، وتم التعامل مع الحادث على الفور داخليا".

title: Mum and dad 'shattered' to learn daughter, 1, has rare genetic condition that means she may never speak
creator: mylondonnewsdesk@reachplc.com (Hannah Cottrell PA Real Life, Will Twigger)
content: A mum was left "shattered" after discovering her young daughter has a rare genetic condition affecting her brain, meaning she will never be able to speak, may struggle to walk and could require lifelong care. Leigh Grant, 34, from Sutton-on-the-Hill, Derbyshire, and her fiance Elliot Oxley, 29 - who have set up a GoFundMe campaign for expensive gene therapy in the States - welcomed their second daughter, one-year-old Etta, in October 2022. However, they soon noticed that her development wasn't progressing as expected when compared to their first child, five year old Florence. READ MORE: 'I had to clean up pools of blood in my shop - it's scary to live here' Leigh, who runs a hair extension business, said Etta wasn't "meeting the usual milestones" like crawling and talking. After turning one, Etta began experiencing eye-rolls, seizures and "projectile vomiting", leading to three separate hospital admissions. Despite her vitals repeatedly coming back normal, Leigh and Elliot sought further answers and opted for private care. In July this year, a neurologist diagnosed Etta with Rett syndrome, a rare genetic neurological and developmental disorder that affects brain growth. The news left the couple "shattered", knowing their daughter will "never speak", may struggle to walk or use her hands, and could need care for the rest of her life. Now, the parents are hesitant about having more children for fear they too might have the rare condition, even though they don't carry the gene...

title: 25 കോടിയുടെ ഭാഗ്യവാൻ കർണാടക സ്വദേശി അൽത്താഫ്
creator: മാധ്യമം ലേഖകൻ
content: സുൽത്താൻ ബത്തേരി: സം​സ്ഥാ​ന സ​ർ​ക്കാ​റി​ന്റെ തി​രു​വോ​ണം ബം​ബ​ര്‍ ലോട്ടറിയുടെ ഒ​ന്നാം സ​മ്മാ​നം 25 കോടി രൂപ അടിച്ചത് കർണാടക പാണ്ഡ്യപുര സ്വദേശി അൽത്താഫിന്. 42കാരനായ ഇദ്ദേഹം മെക്കാനിക്കാണ്. വയനാട്ടിലെ ബന്ധുവീട്ടിലെത്തിയപ്പോൾ എടുത്ത ടിക്കറ്റിനാണ് സമ്മാനം. വാടകവീട്ടിൽ കഴിയുന്ന അൽത്താഫിന് സ്വന്തമായി ഒരു വീട് വെക്കണമെന്നതാണ് ആദ്യത്തെ ആഗ്രഹം. മകളുടെ വിവാഹം നടത്തണമെന്നും മകന് മെച്ചപ്പെട്ട ഒരു ജോലി വേണമെന്നും അൽത്താഫ് പറയുന്നു. സു​ൽ​ത്താ​ൻ ബ​ത്തേ​രി​യി​ലെ ക​ട​യി​ൽ​നി​ന്ന് വിറ്റ ടിക്കറ്റിനാണ് ഒന്നാം സമ്മാനം ലഭിച്ചത്. ടി.​ജി 434222 എ​ന്ന ടി​ക്ക​റ്റാ​ണ് ബ​ത്തേ​രി ഗാ​ന്ധി ജ​ങ്ഷ​നി​ലെ എ​ൻ.​ജി.​ആ​ർ ലോ​ട്ട​റി ക​ട​യി​ൽ​നി​ന്ന് വി​റ്റ​ത്. ക​ർ​ണാ​ട​ക മൈ​സൂ​രു ഹു​ന്നൂ​ർ ഹ​ള്ളി സ്വ​ദേ​ശി നാ​ഗ​രാ​ജി​ന്റെ ഉ​ട​മ​സ്ഥ​ത​യി​ലു​ള്ള​താ​ണ് ഈ ​ക​ട.

title: Azim Premji Foundation to support CMC Vellore
creator: The Hans India
content: Bengaluru: Christian Medical College Vellore today unveiled plans to set up a new medical college and a teaching hospital on its Chittoor campus and announced a partnership agreement with Azim Premji Foundation to offer value-based healthcare and medical education, primarily for the disadvantaged. As part of the agreement, the Foundation will extend a Rs 500 crore grant to CMC Vellore to set up the medical college and upgrade the existing 120-bed hospital into a teaching hospital with 422 beds. The grant will also enable CMC Vellore, a pioneer in medical education, to extend the distinctive elements of their MBBS education and focus on the discipline of Primary-cum-Secondary Health Care (PSHC) to address the widening disparities in the Indian healthcare sector. The Director of CMC Vellore, Dr Vikram Mathews said, “Our dream is that the new medical college and teaching hospital at our Chittoor Campus will offer a replicable model of relevant medical education, healthcare delivery, research, and outreach, sensitive to the financial, societal and resource constraints of our nation. We are immensely grateful to the Azim Premji Foundation for partnering with us on this journey as CMC Vellore steps into her 125th anniversary in 2025.” The Chief Executive Officer, Azim Premji Foundation, Anurag Behar said, “CMC Vellore is an exemplary institution – the highest quality education and healthcare with deep social commitment. This has made them one of the true beacons for Indian...

title: Близо 12 хил. се ваксинираха с новите варианти ваксини срещу JN.1 на COVID-19
content: С новите варианти ваксини срещу подварианта JN.1 на COVID-19 са ваксинирани 11 983 желаещи. Това казаха от пресслужбата на Министерството на здравеопазването (МЗ). Имунизацията с новите ваксини започна в началото на септември, предаде БТА. В първите две седмици след доставката на новите дози ваксина бяха имунизирани 3264 души, съобщи специализираният сайт „Плюс мен", който е създаден по инициатива на МЗ. Ваксинирането срещу COVID-19 се извършва в имунизационните кабинети на регионалните здравни инспекции, в кабинетите при личния лекар или в други определени за целта лечебни заведения. Имунизацията е по желание и е безплатна. От началото на ваксинационната кампания – 27 декември 2020 г., до 25 август т.г., включително, със завършен ваксинационен курс срещу коронавирусната инфекция са 27 046 деца на възраст 0-17 години, което е 2,45% от децата в страната. Със завършен ваксинационен курс срещу инфекцията са 2 043 979 възрастни, което е 38,27% от възрастното население в България. Към 31 август т.г. в срок на годност в страната ни са налични 1 140 872 дози ваксини срещу COVID-19, които се съхраняват в хладилни съоръжения в регионалните здравни инспекции и в „Бул Био – Национален център по заразни и паразитни болести" ЕАД. В периода 2020 г. - 31 август 2024 г. България е платила 489 979 328 лв. собствени средства за купуване на 8 488 620 дози ваксини срещу COVID-19, показват данните от МЗ, получени в БТА по Закона за достъп до обществена информация. За същия период са унищожени...

title: Qatar hosts preparatory meeting for GCC Health Ministry Undersecretaries
content: Qatar hosted the preparatory meeting for the Undersecretaries of the Ministries of Health of the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) countries yesterday. The meeting was chaired by Dr. Salih Ali Al Marri, Assistant Minister for Health Affairs. The meeting of the Health Ministries’ Undersecretaries comes as part of the preparations for the 10th meeting of the GCC Health Ministers Committee, scheduled to take place in Doha tomorrow. The preparatory meeting discussed a number of important topics aimed at enhancing health cooperation among GCC countries.

title: Magyar szakértők segítettek az aszteroidavadász űrszonda fejlesztésében
creator: NG
content: A Budapesti Műszaki és Gazdaságtudományi Egyetem (BME) szakértői is bekapcsolódtak az Európai Űrügynökség (ESA) aszteroidakutató űreszközének fejlesztésébe – olvasható az egyetem közleményében . A Herát az ESA bolygóvédelmi programjának részeként bocsátották fel. A szonda célja a Didymos nevű kettős aszteroida vizsgálata, valamint az, hogy felmérje a NASA DART missziójának eredményeit. Mint ismeretes , az űreszközt 2022-ben irányították a Didymost kísérő Dimorphosba egy teszt keretében. Az aszteroidák anyagáról, anyagsűrűségéről kevés az információ, márpedig ezek nélkül rendkívül bizonytalan kimenetelű rakétával vagy robbantással letéríteni egy kisbolygót a pályájáról. Amikor például a NASA 2022-ben belevezette DART űrszondáját a 160 méter átmérőjű Dimorphosba, az ütközés az előzetes számításoknál lényegesen nagyobb porfelhőt és pályamódosítást okozott. A Herától azt várják, hogy értékes információkkal fog szolgálni a jövőbeli aszteroida-eltérítő küldetések és a tudomány számára, segíti az aszteroidák geofizikájának, valamint a Naprendszer kialakulásának és evolúciós folyamatainak megértését. Fő űrszondájában két mini műhold is helyet kapott, amelyek a kisbolygóhoz érve kilökődnek és pályára állnak, így összesen három műhold fog képeket készíteni, méréseket, valamint megfigyeléseket végezni. Az ESA-nak szüksége volt a...

title: 매년 반복되는 국감 불출석, "법으로 출석 강제" vs "강제 신중해야"
creator: 권규홍
content: 지난 8일 오전 열린 교육부, 국가교육위원회 등에 대한 국회 교육위원회 국정감사에서 더불어민주당 소속 김영호 위원장이 김건희 여사 논문 대필 의혹 관련 인물로 불출석한 증인인 설민신 한경국립대 교수에 대해 동맹명령장 발부의 건을 가결하고 있다. [사진=연합뉴스] 22대 국회 첫 국정감사가 시작됐지만 국감에 채택된 증인들이 불출석하는 사례가 올해도 이어지고 있어 국회는 증인 강제 출석을 골자로 한 개정안을 속속 내놓고 있다. 다만 일각에선 현행 증인 심문제도 자체에 문제가 있기에 해당 개정안 입법에 신중해야 한다는 지적이다. 앞서 행정안전위원회(행안위)는 김건희 여사 공천개입 의혹의 핵심 인물로 지목된 명태균씨와 김대남 전 대통령실 행정관, 김영선 전 국민의힘 의원, 한남동 대통령 관저 불법 증축 의혹의 핵심 관계자인 김태영·이승만 '21그램' 대표를 증인으로 채택했다. 법제사법위원회(법사위)는 노태우 비자금과 관련해 노소영 아트센터 나비 관장과 노재헌 동아시아문화센터 원장을, '장시호 모해위증교사 의혹'으로 김영철 서울북부지검 차장검사 등을 증인으로 채택했다. 그러나 이들 대부분은 석연치 않은 이유를 들어 불출석 사유서를 제출했고, 일부 증인은 국회의 연락을 피하며 사유서도 제출하지 않은 채 불출석하거나 국감 전 해외로 출국했다. 결국 각 상임위는 채택된 증인들에 대한 동행명령장을 발부하고 종합감사에도 모습을 드러내지 않으면 고발을...

title: Чергову партію "асвабадітєлєй" позбавили боєздатності: Генштаб оновив втрати ворога
content: Чергова понад тисяча російських окупантів поповнила статистику втрат ворога на війні проти України. Як зазначається у повідомленні на сторінці Генерального штабу Збройних сил України у Facebook , загальні бойові втрати ворога за час повномасштабного вторгнення серед особового складу орієнтовно склали близько 665 тис. 200 (+1 тис. 80 за добу) осіб. Серед втрат у техніці окупантів, зокрема 8 тис. 945 (+1) одиниць танків, 17 тис. 765 (+14) бойових броньованих машин, 19 тис. 263 (+41) артилерійські системи та 1 тис. 225 (+2) реактивних систем залпового вогню. Також у цьому переліку, зокрема 976 (+3) одиниць засобів протиповітряної оборони, 369 літаків, 328 гелікоптерів, 16 тис. 767 (+49) безпілотників оперативно-тактичного рівня та 2 тис. 619 (+1) крилатих ракет. Крім того, йдеться про 28 кораблів/катерів, підводний човен, 26 тис. 314 (+74) одиниць автомобільної техніки та автоцистерн, а також 3 тис. 386 (+1) одиниць спецтехніки. У Генштабі додали, що дані уточнюються. Як повідомлялося, за даними Генштабу ЗСУ, внаслідок удару по складу озброєння ворога поблизу населеного пункту Октябрський у Краснодарському краї Росії було підірвано 400 ударних іранських безпілотників "Шахед" . Вони є одним з основних засобів для завдання ударів по українських містах. Аналітик Forbes Девід Акс зауважив, що з моменту придбання перших "Шахедів" в Ірані 2022 року Росія запустила понад 8 тис. вибухонебезпечних безпілотників. Він зазначає, що знищення 400 "Шахедів" має знизити темпи...

title: Sassari, l’auto tocca il cordolo e si ribalta: donna ferita
creator: Emanuele Floris
content: Incidente ieri sera a Sassari. In via Predda Niedda una trentottenne sassarese, che era alla guida di una Bmw, sarebbe stata affiancata da un altro veicolo nel tratto discendente, dove si trova il negozio Florgarden, finendo per toccare il cordolo sul lato sinistro e perdendo il controllo della propria autovettura, che si è ribaltata di fronte al concessionario Citroen. Le condizioni della donna non sarebbero gravi. Secondo una prima ricostruzione della polizia locale sembrerebbe che i due veicoli non si siano toccati. Sul posto anche il 118 e i vigili del fuoco. Nel corso della serata ci sono stati altri due incidenti, senza conseguenze, in viale Italia e in via Budapest.

title: Jeziv iskaz maloljetnog ubojice iz Beograda: ‘Sa sobom sam imao 92 metka. Sve sam planirao iskoristiti...’
creator: Damir Kundić
content: Foto Borna Jaksic PIXSELL Tijekom ispitivanja, dječaku je postavljeno pitanje i sjeća li se kad je posljednji put plakao Dječak ubojica koji je prošlogodišnjeg 3. svibnja ubio devetero vršnjaka i domara u beogradskoj OŠ Vladislav Ribnikar u potpunosti je na suđenju svojim roditeljima ovog tjedna ostao pri svojem prvom iskazu. Otkrio je da je kobnog dana u školu krenuo s metkom u cijevi. “Kad sam krenuo od kuće, okviri su bili u oba pištolja. “Zbrojevka” je bila repetirana i metak je bio u cijevi. Prethodno sam napunio okvire. Imao sam 92 metka u šest okvira i sve sam ih planirao iskoristiti”, rekao je dječak u svojem jezivom priznanju, piše Kurir. Ispričao je da je očeve pištolje “ruger” i “zbrojevka” našao 24. travnja, ali ih je dva dana prije zločina pripremio i stavio u svoju sobu. “Bio sam sam u kući i tražio sam oružje. Pola sata kasnije našao sam ih u ormaru u predsoblju. U ormaru je bila jedna kutija, a iznad nje ruksak koji sam dobro poznavao jer ga je otac nosio u streljanu. U ruksaku je bila kutija koja je imala lokot sa šifrom od tri broja. To sam lako otključao na broju 637 i u kutiji našao dva pištolja i šest okvira. Druga kutija s municijom nije bila zaključana. Sve sam vratio na svoje mjesto, a tjedan dana kasnije kad sam opet bio sam kod kuće, stavio sam majicu preko nadzorne kamere u stanu, opet se popeo na stolicu i uzeo oružje koje sam premjestio u ladicu u svojoj sobi”, ispričao je maloljetnik. Dodaje da ga je otac često...

title: [2024 국감] 김병환 금융위원장 "기업 지배구조 개선 필요성 동의... 상법 개정은 의견 수렴해야"
creator: 임민철
content: 김병환 금융위원장이 10일 국회에서 열린 정무위원회의 금융위원회 등에 대한 국정감사에서 의원 질의에 답하고 있다. [사진=연합뉴스] 김병환 금융위원장이 현행 기업 지배구조 개편 관련 제도와 사외이사 제도 운영이 미흡해 개선이 필요하다는 점을 인정했다. 물적분할·합병 등으로 일반주주 피해를 줄이는 방안을 만들고 있지만, 대주주 의결권 제한이나 이사 충실의무 확대 등 구체적인 지배구조 개선, 내부통제 강화 방안에 대해선 말을 아꼈다. 김 위원장은 10일 국회 정무위원회 국정감사에서 두산 등 사례를 들며 기업 지배구조 개선과 내부통제 강화를 위한 법 개정 방향성을 묻는 김남근 더불어민주당 의원 질의에 "지배구조개선이 필요하다는 것에 같은 의견"이라면서도 "두산 (지배구조 개편) 관련 부분은 주주에게 충분히 설명하라고 할 필요가 있겠다고 보고 (금융감독원의) 정정신고 요구를 통해 보완하고 있다"고 답했다. 김남근 의원은 질의에 앞서 LG화학, SK이노베이션, 두산에너빌리티 등을 언급하며 이들이 추진한 물적분할로 주가가 하락해 이들에 투자한 주주가 피해를 보는 상황이 이어진다고 짚고 "당국도, 내부 이사회도 견제를 못 해 개미 투자자 불만이 크다"고 지적했다. 이어 "일본에선 회사법 개정을 통한 기업 내부통제 강화와 이사회같은 지배구조 개선이 자본시장 밸류업 정책의 핵심 중 하나였다"며 "금융감독원장도 지배구조 개선을 위한 자본시장법을 개정하겠다 발표한 적이 있는데 금융위원회...

title: Следователи назвали вероятную причину пожара в «Доме-корабле», где погибли два человека
creator: Анна Иванова
content: Сотрудники ГСУ Следственного комитета России по Москве рассматривают в качестве основной причины возникновения пожара в «Доме-корабле» на Большой Тульской улице в Москве неисправность электропроводки. Об этом сообщили в пресс-службе ведомства. «По предварительным данным причиной пожара явилась неисправность электрической проводки», — говорится в сообщении. В результате пожара погибли два человека, их тела были обнаружены уже после ликвидации возгорания. Сейчас столичные следователи проводят проверку. Ранее , что сотрудники МЧС спасли несколько человек из этого пожара. Десятки людей эвакуировалась самостоятельно.

title: В центре Перми в выходные изменится движение трамваев
creator: Елена Воробьева
content: В Перми на время изменится движение трамвайных маршрутов No5 и No11. Это связано с заменой контактной сети на улице Борчанинова, сообщается на сайте городской администрации. «C 00:00 12 октября до 5:00 14 октября будет производиться замена контактной сети на улице Борчанинова. На этот период трамвайный маршрут No5 будет следовать в объезд по улицам Революции, Максима Горького и Ленина. Трамвайный маршрут No11 временно не будет курсировать», — говорится на сайте мэрии. Ранее URA.RU рассказывало, что в Перми на десять дней запретят движение транспорта по дороге в Индустриальном районе. Информация об этом содержится в распоряжении краевого министерства транспорта. title: KT "MS와 2.4조 AI·클라우드 투자...기술주권 침해 우려 無"(종합)
content: 는 마이크로소프트(MS)와 인공지능(AI), 클라우드 분야에 2조4000억원 규모를 공동투자해 내년 한국형 AI 개발 및 공공·금융 부문 클라우드 서비스 상용화에 나서겠다는 구체적인 로드맵을 발표했다. MS와의 협력으로 한국의 기술 주권을 잃는 것이 아니냐는 우려에는 "너무 걱정하지 않아도 된다"고 일축했다. 10일 김영섭 KT 대표는 노보텔 앰배서더 서울 동대문에서 열린 AICT 사업전략 발표 기자간담회에서 '(MS와 협력하는 것에 대해) 많은 사람이 위험하지 않냐고 우려하고 있는 것을 안다"며 "MS는 세계적으로 주권을 지켜주면서 공공·금융 부문에서 KT뿐만 아니라 유럽에서도 지속적으로 서비스를 제공하고 있어 너무 걱정하지 않아도 될 것 같다"고 밝혔다. 이어 "최고 수준의 기술을 가져다가 소버린티(자주권)을 확실히 지켜가면서도 제품과 서비스를 가장 빨리 제공하는 것이 KT가 기여하는 것이고 살아남는 방법"이라고 덧붙였다. MS와 협력하게 된 배경에 대해 김 대표는 "AI·클라우드 시장에서 경쟁력 확보를 위해 파트너를 찾던 두 회사의 지향점이 잘 맞았고 한국형 AI·클라우드 모델을 공동 개발해 제공하자는 사업 목표가 일치했기 때문"이라고 밝혔다. 조원우 한국MS 대표는 "MS는 한국형 AI에 관심이 많다"며 "한국 기업의 산업 전문성과 융합해 더 파괴적인 AI를 만들 수 있는 기반이 있다고 본다"고 했다. 또 "고도화된 AI 솔루션은 MS의 확장뿐만 아니라 KT의 파트너십 시장 진출에도 도움이 될 것이라고 확신한다"고 전했다. title: Nekima opterećenje, drugima pomoć: Platforma „Zdravitas“ unela pometnju u škole
content: Podeli : Platforma "Zdravitas" koja bi trebalo da prati motorni razvoj učenika od trećeg razreda osnovne, pa do kraja srednje škole, već u početku nailazi na prepreke. Ovaj projekat Fakulteta sporta i fizičkog obrazovanja podržalo je Ministarstvo prosvete, ali ga ne podržavaju reprezentativni sindikati. A nastavnici fizičkog vaspitanja kažu - da je sve u cilju poboljšanja zdravstvenog statusa đaka. Od ove školske godine, osim ocena, roditelji bi mogli da prate i motorni razvoj svoje dece. Platformi Zdravitas, ipak, zdravicu neće održati svi. „Postoji es-dnevnik, postoji JOB, postoji JISP, postoji SPIRI. Verujte mi, ja više ne mogu ni da nabrojim sve te skraćenice kojima smo mi opterećeni“, kaže Mirjana Gašić iz USPRS. Nekima opterećenje, a nekima pomoć. Nastavnici fizičkog vaspitanja kažu – ovo nije ništa novo. title: SANDRA Dewi Bikin Hakim Tertawa Saat Hadir Sebagai Saksi Sidang Korupsi Harvey Moeis: Suami Tercinta
content: si suaminya, di Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Pusat, Kamis (10/10/2024). Sandra datang ke Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Pusat (PN Jakpus) mengenakan atasan dan celana panjang berwarna hitam. Aktris 41 tahun tersebut berjalan sembari menyimpulkan tangan ketika berjalan masuk ke ruang sidang yang dikerumunin awak media. Hadir di ruang sidang dan duduk berjejer bersama 12 saksi lainnya, ditanya soal sosol . "Saksi , kenal dengan terdakwa ?" tanya hakim, dikutip dari siaran langsung Kompas.com, Kamis (10/10/2024). Dengan lantang menjawab, bahwa Harvey adalah suami tercintanya. "Sangat kenal Yang Mulia," jawab Sandra. "Karena?" tanya Hakim lagi. "Suami saya yang tercinta Yang Mulia," jawab Sandra lagi. Jawaban Sandra tersebut sontak memicu gelak tawa dan sorakan yang hadir di ruang sidang. Sebelumnya, Kejaksaan Agung (Kejagung) telah menjelaskan soal nasib terkait kasus korupsi . Dikutip dari YouTube Cumicumi, Senin (2/9/2024), Kapuspenkum Kejaksaan Agung (Kejagung), Harly Siregar menjelaskan soal nasib saat ini. Harly Siregar mengatakan, bahwa jaksa penuntut umum (JPU) masih terus melakakukan pemeriksaan terhahap .

title: Sokoto United coach, Ajeni sets target ahead of new season
creator: Taiwo Adesanya
content: Daily Post Nigeria Sokoto United coach, Ajeni sets target ahead of new season Home News Politics Metro Entertainment Sport Sport Sokoto United coach, Ajeni sets target ahead of new season Published on October 10, 2024 By Taiwo Adesanya Sokoto United head coach, Peter Ajeni says he is confident in the team’s ability to finish strong in the upcoming season. Ajeni’s side are drawn in Northern Conference Group D for 2024-25 Nigeria National League (NNL) season. Sokoto United will compete with Wikki Tourists, Zamfara United, Ijele United, Mailantarki Care, Mighty Jets, Gombe United, Adamawa United and Barau FC in their group. “We are aware of the challenges posed by our group opponents, but we are confident in our team’s ability to compete and secure a strong position in the league,” Ajeni told Sokoto United’s media. “We are excited to get back to work and build on the progress made in previous seasons. “Our goal is to ensure Sokoto United FC is competitive and successful in the NNL, and we are committed to providing the necessary resources and support.” Related Topics: Ajeni Sokoto United Don't Miss Transfer: He’s more than a footballer – Gallas names next English club Ronaldo could join You may like Sokoto United resume preparations for new NNL season Sokoto United sign five new players NNL: Sokoto United sign Kano Pillars teenager NNL: Sokoto United announce Bitrus, Igoche’s signing Sokoto United complete Christopher Ododo’s signing Musa moves from Zamfara to Sokoto United...

Neuseeland | Von Polizei gesucht: Vater und Kinder in der Wildnis gesichtet
creator: Thomas Wanhoff
content: Jäger sind in der Wildnis von Neuseeland offenbar einem als verschwunden gemeldeten Vater und seinen Kindern begegnet. Der Mann wird von der Polizei gesucht. Ein Vater, der mit seinen Kindern vor drei Jahren in Neuseeland verschwunden war, ist offenbar in einem entlegenen Teil des Landes gesichtet worden. Tom P. war mit seinen drei Kindern kurz vor Weihnachten 2021 geflohen. Gegen ihn gibt es einen Haftbefehl wegen Bankraubs, berichtet der britische "The Guardian". Er soll auch ein Quadbike gestohlen haben und in einen Laden eingebrochen sein. Grund für die Flucht soll ein Streit zwischen P. und der Mutter der Kinder gewesen sein. P. und sein Nachwuchs im Alter zwischen jetzt acht und elf Jahren wurde vor wenigen Tagen von Schweinejägern in der Region Waikato gesehen. Videoaufnahmen zeigen einen Mann und drei weitere Personen, der Größe nach offenbar Kinder, in Tarnkleidung und mit Rucksäcken ausgerüstet. P. trägt kurze Hosen, die Kinder Regenkleidung. Die Jäger nahmen die Gruppe auf Video auf. Mutter erleichert über Sichtung Nach Angaben des zuständigen Polizeisprechers Andrew Saunders seien die Aufnahmen glaubhaft und die Behörden gehen davon aus, dass es sich tatsächlich um den gesuchten Vater und seine Kinder handelt. Es wurde eine Suche eingeleitet, die bislang aber ohne Ergebnis blieb. "Unser Hauptaugenmerk liegt auf der sicheren Rückkehr der Kinder zu ihrer whānau [Familie], und wir tun alles, was wir können, um dies zu ermöglichen", hieß es in einer...

title: Canadiens outlast Maple Leafs
creator: By The Associated Press
content: MONTREAL (AP) — Sam Montembeault made 48 saves, Cole Caufield scored on a first-period power play and the Montreal Canadiens beat the Toronto Maple Leafs 1-0 on Wednesday night in the season opener for both teams. Caufield scored at 7:48 of the opening period, finishing off a tic-tac-toe play with Juraj Slafkovsky and Kirby Dach. The Canadiens were 1 for 5 on the power play after going 0 for 30 in the preseason. Anthony Stolarz made 26 saves for Toronto after expected starter Joseph Woll was held out of the lineup. Coach Craig Berube said Woll had “lower-body tightness.” RANGERS 6, PENGUINS 0 PITTSBURGH (AP) — Igor Shesterkin stopped 29 shots and New York opened the season with a victory over Pittsburgh. Chris Kreider scored twice for the reigning Metropolitan Division champions. Sam Carrick, Alexis Lafreniere, Filip Chytil and Vincent Trocheck also scored for New York, which dominated Pittsburgh while beating the Penguins for the fifth time in their last six meetings. Chytil’s goal was his first in over 18 months after he missed most of last season due to a concussion. The center’s flick to the far post against Tristan Jarry just before the game’s midway point boosted New York’s lead to 4-0. Jarry stopped 35 of the 41 shots he faced for Pittsburgh. Penguins star Sidney Crosby was held scoreless in his 20th season opener. Evgeni Malkin was held without a point. The Russian star began his 19th season with 498 career goals and 798 career assists. title: „Staatsaffäre“ um Eintracht-Star: Larsson packt nach Schweden-Drama aus
creator: Christopher Michel
content: Hugo Larsson stand kurz nach seiner Abreise aus dem Nationalteam wieder auf dem Trainingsplatz. Was ist die wahre Geschichte hinter seiner Abreise? Frankfurt - Als Hugo Larsson, der Mittelfeldspieler von , das schwedische Nationalteam Anfang September vorzeitig verließ, wurde dies in den schwedischen Medien fast als „Staatsaffäre“ behandelt. Es wurde vermutet, dass sein vorzeitiger Abgang nicht aufgrund einer Verletzung, sondern wegen eines Streits mit Nationaltrainer Jon Dal Tomasson erfolgte. . Larsson spricht über seine vorzeitig Abreise beim schwedischen Nationalteam Einen Monat später hat sich die Aufregung gelegt. : „Wenn Sie Fußball kennen, dann wissen Sie, dass es manchmal so ist. Ich hatte im Rücken ein ähnliches Gefühl, wie ich es schon zweimal hatte. Es war schön, dass ich nach Frankfurt zurückkommen und die Untersuchung durchführen konnte. Es hat alles geklappt und so konnte ich drei bis vier Tage später wieder problemlos trainieren.“ Unabhängig davon, ob es sich um eine echte Verletzung oder eine „Staats-Affäre“ handelte, müssen Larsson und Tomasson im Interesse des Fußballs eine gemeinsame Basis finden. Das zu Saisonbeginn stark aufspielende „Juwel“ bestätigte: „Es war sehr wichtig, dass Tomasson angerufen hat. Wir haben die Sache geklärt. Es ist klar, dass wir uns zu Wort melden mussten, auch wenn es für uns keine so große Sache war, wie es die Medien dargestellt haben.“ Trotzdem gab es große Verwunderung. Eintracht-Star bestätigt Aussprache...

title: Menjelang Pilkada Serentak 2024, Polres Sampang akan Rutin Jalankan Tes Urine
content: Hal itu dilakukan untuk memastikan personil dalam kondisi prima dan terbebas dari penyalahgunaan Narkoba saat melaksanakan pengamanan pentahapan Pilkada Sampang 2024. Sebelumnya, tepatnya pada Kamis (9/10/2024) kemarin, terdapat sekitar 11 personel melaksanakan di Mapolres setempat. Hasilnya semua negatif. Kasi Propam Iptu Slamet Efendi mengatakan bahwa pengawasan yang ketat itu (tes urine) akan terus dilaksanakan di Polres ataupun di Polsek jajarannya. "Kami ingin menjaga kepercayaan masyarakat terhadap institusi Kepolisian dalam perhelatan pemilihan kepala daerah tahun 2024," ujarnya. Menurutnya, merupakan tindak lanjut Entry Briefing Kapolres Sampang AKBP Hendro Sukmono yang akan menindak tegas. Bahkan, tidak ada toleransi terhadap anggota Polri yang diketahui memakai apalagi ikut dalam jaringan Narkoba di Sampang. "Tes urine ini juga salah satu bentuk pengawasan internal yang rutin dilakukan dalam mewujudkan bersih dari Narkoba," pungkasnya. Ikuti berita seputar

title: Gqeberha regional winners for the 2024 Vodacom Journalist of the Year Awards
content: More than 1,200 entries were received from journalists around the country as they shared examples of their best work from the past year. "As we commemorate 30 years of democracy in South Africa, we are reminded of the importance of media as the fourth estate that is crucial to our democracy," said Takalani Netshitenzhe, Director for External Affairs at Vodacom South Africa. "Ethical, independent and critical journalism holds those in power accountable and brings transparency to affairs that matter." "Coinciding with 30 years of democracy, Vodacom South Africa celebrates 30 years of connecting South Africans and we are proud to be continuing our legacy of honouring excellence in journalism across a range of categories, recognising some of South Africa's finest reporters and most newsworthy stories. Support for journalism remains paramount as the sustainability of journalism creates well-informed and connected societies." Ryland Fischer, with more than 40 years of experience in the media industry as an editor, journalist, and columnist amongst other roles, is the convenor of the judging panel which includes, Arthur Goldstuck, Patricia McCraken, Professor Gilbert Motsaathebe, Neo Ntsoma, Collin Nxumalo, Jovial Rantao, Dr Elna Rossouw, Advocate Robin Selwal and Obed Zilwa. title: Banks closing branches and ATMs in South Africa
content: Two of South Africa's major banks have closed branches in recent years, and another has significantly reduced branch square meterage as banking habits in the country shift to digital channels. Absa and Nedbank are two examples that have significantly reduced their branch footprints. Since the 2017/18 financial year, Nedbank has closed 57 of its brick-and-mortar locations, while Absa has reduced its footprint by a more modest 22 branches. This is primarily due to more customers shifting to digital channels like banking apps and online banking platforms. Nedbank recently told MyBroadband that customers using its digital channels had grown by 9% in the past year, while digital servicing volumes grew by almost 20%. "We have seen a corresponding decrease in our in-branch volumes over the same period," it added. While Standard Bank has increased its number of branches in South Africa over the past five years, it has significantly reduced branch square meterage for the same reasons. Standard Bank said in-branch transactions declined by 13% to 2.5 million during the year's first half, while online transactions increased by 30%. "Online transactions increased by 30% to 1.5 billion transactions with Standard Bank clients performing an average of 10,400 digital transactions per month, compared to just 0.017 transactions in branches," it said. Standard Bank said it had reduced branch square meters by 4% to 239,000m2 to adapt to shifting banking habits. It emphasised that it had done so...

title: 5G will unlock Manufacturing 4.0
content: Gary Woolley, Chief Commercial Officer at Comsol. This is according to Gary Woolley, Chief Commercial Officer at Comsol, who says: "Traditional networks are holding manufacturers back. There is growing local interest in how machine learning and AI can support safer, more efficient operations, enable proactive decision making and improve revenues. But to get the true value of AI, you need the right infrastructure in place." He says: "Industry 4.0 brings with it a need for networks to handle data-heavy applications like IoT, real-time analytics, and autonomous operations. Until recently, there wasn't one connectivity service that supported the various use cases equally effectively, so we have seen the emergence of multiple different networks running in the manufacturing environments, with Wi-Fi and fibre playing a part. Traditional networks like Wi-Fi were not designed to handle the demands of Industry 4.0, because they have limited range and are prone to congestion and interference, which creates bottlenecks in scaling operations. Challenges also occur in control, reliability and scalability." Changing the game Wooley says Private 5G is a game-changing mobile technology that opens up new possibilities for manufacturers: "With an increase in speeds and latency as low as 1 millisecond, it opens up new possibilities for smart factories, where real-time data can drive efficiencies and safety like never before." However, he highlights key differences between consumer grade 5G and...

title: R112-billion fix for South Africa's transmission grid disaster
content: The National Transmission Company South Africa (NTCSA) has set aside R112 billion for the Transmission Development Programme (TPD), allowing nearly 30,000MW of utility-scale renewable generation to be online within the next five years. Speaking at the NTCSA's official launch on Monday, 7 October 2024, chair Priscillah Mabelane said the company recognises that collaboration with the private sector is critical to ensuring that the 53,000MW required over the next decade will come online. "Despite being a newly formed entity, the NTCSA has already made substantial progress in implementing its strategy," said Mabelane. "We have approved R112 billion for TDP investment in the next five years." The TDP requires an R390-billion expansion of the national transmission grid over the next 10 years to allow for independent power producer (IPP) plants and new generation capacity to send the electricity they generate to other parts of the country. In an NTCSA statement announcing the launch, the entity said it must accelerate the construction of new transmission development infrastructure to execute the TDP at the required scale and pace. "It is anticipated that in the next five years, there will be 30GW of utility-scale renewables connected to the grid by the end of 2029," it said. "A step change will be required to... Myles Illidge

title: New South African bank's fight against Capitec
content: Old Mutual has launched a mobile virtual network operator (MVNO) that has cloned Capitec Connect's aggressive data pricing strategy. Although it hasn't named its main rival directly, Old Mutual has made no secret of its ambitions to go after Capitec's customer base. Old Mutual Connect is its latest shot across Capitec's bow. The financial service provider plans to launch its new bank, OM Bank, before the end of 2024. It will target the upper mass market and lower affluent customers who earn between R5,000 and R80,000 per month. This is the segment where Capitec has seen tremendous success, rapidly growing to serve over 20 million customers since its launch in 2001. Even though OM Bank has not yet launched, Old Mutual recently revealed it already has a million customers for its transactional banking capability. Bidvest Bank currently administers its Money Account, but this will change before the insurer and investment service provider's new bank is launched. To compete against the established bank, Old Mutual said it would leverage the existing 3.1 million lower-income South Africans served by its Mass and Foundation insurance cluster. This cluster serves low-income and lower-middle-income individuals, who typically earn between R1,000 and R30,000 per month. Earlier this week, Old Mutual announced the launch of an MVNO, promising that it will offer competitive mobile services that will transform mobile connectivity in the lower-income market.
